attributes.action: Provide support to professional UK Bed & Breakfasts duirng COVID-19 crisis.
attributes.additional_details:
Along with airlines, this sector is MOST affected by COVID restrictions and technology and remote working is of no use to them!
Cancellations now far exceed bookings which have dried up.
attributes.background: Financial support or a VAT break is needed.   Government could demand that banks give BnBs a mortgage holiday.  Business rates measures offered in budget DO NOT help B&Bs and vacation rentals in any way.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302162
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302889

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
